original_title: Income promotion program to be handed to the President
original_body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); The program for income promotion in Sri Lanka will be presented to the President on Wednesday (12).
State Minister of Finance Ranjith Siyambalapitiya said the future program will be presented on Wednesday (12) morning at the President's Office.
It will include proposals on methods of increasing income without burdening the people.
122 million more people pushed into hunger since 2019, UN study finds
